version_description: Push it real good—we’ve engineered our push notifications in this release to be more practical. And of course, Grover’s been improving the technical stability of the app for your enhanced experience.
Hey there. A short note this time just to let you know this update allows us to be even more personal in the way we communicate with you in the app.
This quiet update doesn’t rock the boat—in fact, it makes your experience just a bit more stable.
This quiet update doesn’t rock the boat—in fact, it makes your experience just a bit more stable.

Ta-dah! Welcome to Grover’s brand new look. You’ll notice our lovely ‘torch red’ icon on your home screen and a fresh logo and color scheme within the app. We’ve also updated the ‘Account’ menu from web-based to native.
This quiet update doesn’t rock the boat—in fact, it makes your experience just a bit more stable.
